title: #109: Lady Heroin: What Are You Asking Me For? (Jesse, Joey @MadFlavor Diaz)
itunes:title: Lady Heroin: What Are You Asking Me For? with Joey Diaz, Jesse
description: Joey Diaz helps me introduce the first of my two interview about heroin use that I did from my hotel room in Vancouver. This one gives an overview of how heroin makes you feel and how much pull it can have on you. This kid managed to get out of it's grasp while he was still young. It's a good talk on being a "functional" dope fiend.

It's a good talk on being a "functional" dope fiend.
